title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 26.1 - Purpose of regulation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 26.1 - Purpose of regulation

State Regulations

The purpose of this regulation is to prescribe requirements
for notices of sale of notes by municipalities, school districts and district
corporations. It is adopted pursuant to section
60.00
(e) of the Local Finance Law, which requires
the Comptroller to adopt a rule in connection with the public sale of
notes: (a) prescribing a procedure for
the circularization of notices for the public sale of notes; and
(b) prescribing such data and information as
he may deem advisable to be contained in such notices. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
26.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
